title: Zapiekanka
ingredients: ['1 baguette', '4 to 8 slices thinly sliced ham or lunchmeat of choice (optional)', '150g sauteed mushrooms', '100g grated melting cheese of choice', 'ketchup to taste', 'Optional additions', 'raw or cooked vegetables of choice', 'mayonnaise', '1 small handful chopped chives']
